The mats on your pets' fur not only devaluate their charm, but also cause skin irritation forcing them to bite and scratch their skin. The mat will not go away by itself, and fur will get even more tangled. The Pet Republique's dual sided teeth designed matt breaker give you the best result of de-matting for even the longest and densest coats of dogs, cats, rabbits, long haired breed pets. The less teeth side for stubborn tangles and the denser teeth side for faster results or thinning and de-shedding. The mat breaker's blades are very sharp on the inside but rounded on the outsider edge. This design provide much safer experience than the traditional sickle shape mat combs, and it recommended for pet with sensitive skin. The non-slip and ergonomic designed handles provide fast effortless cuts. Our stainless steel teeth are strong and sharp to last for years. These de-shedding brush / undercoat rake are quality controlled during the process of manufacturing; parts will not be loose or fall apart. Making this the best dematting comb for cats, dogs and all furry friends. Clear instruction is printed at the back of the package. Pick the mats, don't pull!
